content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the Second World War.
content.question: The widespread hostility and resistance to German occupation during the Second World War is best explained in the context of the

choices.label: broad commitment to communism on the part of European peasants and workers
strong support for resistance movements by neutral countries
German occupiers’ attempts to implement Nazi racial theories

content.answer: German occupiers’ attempts to implement Nazi racial theories

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
